name: google-glog 0.7.1
body:
This is a maintenance release that addresses several issues found in [glog 0.7.0](https://github.com/google/glog/releases/tag/v0.7.0). In particular, we fixed Android detection (#1094) and properly format unknown stack frames now (#1092).

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/glog/compare/v0.7.0...v0.7.1

name: google-glog 0.7.0
body:
In this release, glog underwent a major overhaul to take advantage of C++14 language and library features. Among the many changes, the public API has also been extended to use the more up-to-date standard library types (notably `chrono`).

## Highlights

* C++14 is now the primary language standard
* [Emscripten](https://emscripten.org/) support
* Many fixes and enhancements

## Compatibility

glog aims to maintain source compatibility with the previous release. We did our best to ensure such compatibility in this version as well. However, downstream clients must recompile against the new glog version due to **ABI incompatible** changes.

## Deprecations

A number of functions, methods, and types have been deprecated in favor of more uniform interface.

> [!WARNING]
Deprecated methods will be **removed** in glog 0.8.0. Please make sure to update your code.

* `google::LogMessage::getMessageTime` has been superseded by `google::LogMessage::time`.
* `google::LogMessageTime::timestamp` has been superseded by  `google::LogMessageTime::when`.
* `google::LogMessageTime::gmtoff` has been superseded by `google::LogMessageTime::gmtoffset`.
* `google::EnableLogCleaner(unsigned)` has been superseded by `google::EnableLogCleaner(std::chrono::minutes)`.
* `google::LogSink::send` accepting `std::tm` (deprecated since glog 0.6.0) has been superseded by `google::LogSink::send` to accept `google::LogMessageTime` instead.
* `google::LogMessageInfo` and the custom prefix callback accepting this type have been superseded by `google::LogMessage`. To customize the log line prefix use the `google::InstallPrefixFormatter` function instead of the `google::InitGoogleLogging` overload.

## Further changes

* `google::LogSeverity` has been converted to an unscoped `enum`. This can result in compilation issues if implicit conversion between an `int` and `google::LogSeverity` was erroneously assumed.
* By default, CMake no longer generates the undocumented and untested pkg-config files. The support is now opt in which requires the CMake option `WITH_PKGCONFIG` to be explicitly set to `ON`.

## What's Changed
* bazel: Use glog 0.6.0 in README. by @xiaoxq in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/831
* Strip only the first leading @ in repo name by @meteorcloudy in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/832
* fix: Fix warning about redefining STDC_HEADERS by @joeyparrish in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/835

* simplify DLOG macro definition in NDEBUG mode by @lstaroth in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/830
* windows: call to FormatMessage() should _IGNORE_INSERTS by @anpol in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/849
* log_file_header: add option to disable log file headers. by @anpol in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/850
* SetLogger should delete previously set custom logger. by @anpol in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/853
* logsink: fix multiple issues with LogSink::ToString() by @anpol in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/852
* Fix broken stacktrace by @marekcirkos in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/851
* Revert "simplify DLOG macro definition in NDEBUG mode" by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/855
* Remove symbolize Bazel test by @drigz in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/860
* Disable cc toolchain resolution when using Clang on Windows by @comius in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/863
* Fix Windows clang CI for CC toolchain resolution by @jsharpe in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/877
* ci: run linux workflow on ubuntu 22.04 by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/885
* ci: update actions by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/886

* drop custom prefix option by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/898

name: google-glog 0.7.0-rc1
body:
In this release, glog underwent a major overhaul to take advantage of C++14 language and library features. Among the many changes, the public API has also been extended to use the more up-to-date standard library types (notably `chrono`).

Please take the opportunity to test this release candidate and report any issues. The final release of glog 0.7.0 is expected in **early February** 2024.

## Highlights

* C++14 is now the primary language standard
* [Emscripten](https://emscripten.org/) support
* Many fixes and enhancements

## Compatibility

glog aims to maintain source compatibility with the previous release. We did our best to ensure such compatibility in this version as well. However, downstream clients must recompile against the new glog version due to **ABI incompatible** changes.

## Deprecations

A number of functions, methods, and types have been deprecated in favor of more uniform interface.

> [!WARNING]
Deprecated methods will be **removed** in glog 0.8.0. Please make sure to update your code.

* `google::LogMessage::getMessageTime` has been superseded by `google::LogMessage::time`.
* `google::LogMessageTime::timestamp` has been superseded by  `google::LogMessageTime::when`.
* `google::LogMessageTime::gmtoff` has been superseded by `google::LogMessageTime::gmtoffset`.
* `google::EnableLogCleaner(unsigned)` has been superseded by `google::EnableLogCleaner(std::chrono::minutes)`.
* `google::LogSink::send` accepting `std::tm` (deprecated since glog 0.6.0) has been superseded by `google::LogSink::send` to accept `google::LogMessageTime` instead.
* `google::LogMessageInfo` and the custom prefix callback accepting this type have been superseded by `google::LogMessage`. To customize the log line prefix use the `google::InstallPrefixFormatter` function instead of the `google::InitGoogleLogging` overload.

## Further changes

* `google::LogSeverity` has been converted to an unscoped `enum`. This can result in compilation issues if implicit conversion between an `int` and `google::LogSeverity` was erroneously assumed.
* By default, CMake no longer generates the undocumented and untested pkg-config files. The support is now opt in which requires the CMake option `WITH_PKGCONFIG` to be explicitly set to `ON`.

* bazel: Use glog 0.6.0 in README. by @xiaoxq in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/831

name: google-glog 0.6.0
body:
## What's Changed
* bazel: Use glog 0.5.0 in README by @drigz in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/647
* Expose `IsGoogleLoggingInitialized()` in public API. by @xkszltl in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/651
* Fix cmake configuration for cygwin environment by @romange in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/656
* Allow updating vmodule levels after vmodule level has been cached by @romange in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/650
* Export COPYING by @fmeum in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/666
* cmake: fixed msvc snprintf detection (fixes #668) by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/670
* cmake: allow to override `-fPIC` by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/672
* cmake: export `<atomic>` availability (fixes #667) by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/671
* Remove ubuntu1604 from presubmit.yml by @philwo in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/677
* bazel: add GLOG_CUSTOM_PREFIX_SUPPORT by @luliyucoordinate in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/676
* log messages periodically (time-based) by @darbitman in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/669
* ci: support more targets by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/686
* cmake: prefer linking against gflags::gflags (fixes #683) by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/684
* Fix syscall deprecation warning on macOS >= 10.12 by @z-aki in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/685
* fixed exception specification mismatch by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/687
* readme: fix wrong header id by @StephLin in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/674
* eliminate warnings by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/688
* fixed additional warnings by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/694
* Add an static cast to compare unsigned with unsigned by @Fettpet in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/696
* Fix: not implement virtual class when WITH_CUSTOM_PREFIX on by @Starsss in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/700
* Change size type in AnnotateBenignRaceSized to size_t from long by @dfreese in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/706
* Fix link error for Emscripten by @kinsei0916 in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/710
* `raw_logging.h` depends on type definition in `logging.h`. by @xkszltl in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/713
* export `OS_*` defines (fixes #715) by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/716
* Fix `syscall` warning in Bazel Build by @ArthurBandaryk in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/718
* Add -Werror to Bazel presubmits by @drigz in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/719
* added gmock support by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/720
* Support stack unwind on Android by @huangqinjin in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/708
* add linux github workflow by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/722
* ci: replace generated headers by templates by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/723
* add mock log test by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/724
* added log cleaner tests and fixed paths by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/732
* Make LogCleaner support relative paths by @aesophor in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/654
* cmake: Fix incorrect relative-path concatenation by @nh2 in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/733
* Restore the stream format after writing the log prefix by @meyerj in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/731
* fix `glog-modules.cmake` install by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/739
* protect VLOG by use_logging by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/742
* Fix log filename format by @cmsflash in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/747
* Add Zhuoran Shen to AUTHORS and CONTRIBUTORS by @cmsflash in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/748
* ci: reworked windows builds by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/737
* cmake: set CMP0074 policy by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/751
* ci: use codecov token by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/752
* Added gmtoff() method in 'LogMessageTime' to get GMT offset by @vijaysattigeri in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/727
* LogCleaner: Fix relative paths and add a new test by @aesophor in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/754
* eliminate msvc warnings by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/757
* cmake: require at least version 3.16 by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/758
* ci: enable warnings as errors by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/759
* LogCleaner: make `overdue_days_` unsigned int by @aesophor in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/760
* ci: remove deprecated msvc runner by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/762
* provide backward compatible send overload by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/763
* run clang-tidy by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/765
* eliminate clang warnings by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/766
* ensure `_Unwind_Backtrace` to actually be available by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/767
* cmake: do not search for platform specific unwind by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/769
* revert to signed int atomics by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/770
* Add the "FLAG_log_year_in_prefix" by @msamoila in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/771
* use uint32 for --max-log-size by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/773
* stdcxx: eliminate excessive use of std::string::c_str() by @anpol in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/775
* cmake: require at least gflags 2.2.2 by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/781
* Changed my Email ID by @vijaysattigeri in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/782
* On Solaris, GetHostName() returns empty string by @fkolarek in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/783
* LogCleaner: avoid scanning logs too frequently by @fdgkhdkgh in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/776
* libglog.pc: Set Libs.private for static linking by @Arfrever in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/787
* cmake: enable custom prefix by default by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/788
* simplify flags export by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/791
* rename `GOOGLE_GLOG_DLL_DECL` to `GLOG_EXPORT` by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/764
* cmake_package_config_generate: Fix CMake warnings with CMake 3.23 by @Arfrever in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/792
* Tests: Respect TEST_TMPDIR, TMPDIR, TMP environmental variables by @Arfrever in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/794
* Add the logtostdout and colorlogtostdout flag to allow logging to stdout by @git-hulk in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/790
* Add clang-cl.exe to Bazel CI by @drigz in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/802
* Fix "'GLOG_EXPORT' macro redefined" on clang-cl by @drigz in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/803
* Fix namespace resolution issue in LOG_EVERY_T by @skeptic-monkey in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/801
* release 0.6 by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/812

## New Contributors
* @xkszltl made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/651
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/666
* @luliyucoordinate made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/676
* @darbitman made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/669
* @z-aki made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/685

* @Starsss made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/700
* @dfreese made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/706
* @kinsei0916 made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/710
* @ArthurBandaryk made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/718
* @nh2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/733
* @meyerj made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/731
* @cmsflash made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/747
* @vijaysattigeri made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/727
* @anpol made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/775
* @fkolarek made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/783
* @fdgkhdkgh made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/776
* @Arfrever made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/787
* @git-hulk made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/790

name: google-glog 0.6.0-rc1
body:
## What's Changed
* bazel: Use glog 0.5.0 in README by @drigz in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/647
* Expose `IsGoogleLoggingInitialized()` in public API. by @xkszltl in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/651
* Fix cmake configuration for cygwin environment by @romange in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/656
* Allow updating vmodule levels after vmodule level has been cached by @romange in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/650
* Export COPYING by @fmeum in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/666
* cmake: fixed msvc snprintf detection (fixes #668) by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/670
* cmake: allow to override `-fPIC` by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/672
* cmake: export `<atomic>` availability (fixes #667) by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/671
* Remove ubuntu1604 from presubmit.yml by @philwo in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/677
* bazel: add GLOG_CUSTOM_PREFIX_SUPPORT by @luliyucoordinate in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/676
* log messages periodically (time-based) by @darbitman in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/669
* ci: support more targets by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/686
* cmake: prefer linking against gflags::gflags (fixes #683) by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/684
* Fix syscall deprecation warning on macOS >= 10.12 by @z-aki in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/685
* fixed exception specification mismatch by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/687
* readme: fix wrong header id by @StephLin in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/674
* eliminate warnings by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/688
* fixed additional warnings by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/694
* Add an static cast to compare unsigned with unsigned by @Fettpet in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/696
* Fix: not implement virtual class when WITH_CUSTOM_PREFIX on by @Starsss in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/700
* Change size type in AnnotateBenignRaceSized to size_t from long by @dfreese in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/706
* Fix link error for Emscripten by @kinsei0916 in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/710
* `raw_logging.h` depends on type definition in `logging.h`. by @xkszltl in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/713
* export `OS_*` defines (fixes #715) by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/716
* Fix `syscall` warning in Bazel Build by @ArthurBandaryk in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/718
* Add -Werror to Bazel presubmits by @drigz in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/719
* added gmock support by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/720
* Support stack unwind on Android by @huangqinjin in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/708
* add linux github workflow by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/722
* ci: replace generated headers by templates by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/723
* add mock log test by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/724
* added log cleaner tests and fixed paths by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/732
* Make LogCleaner support relative paths by @aesophor in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/654
* cmake: Fix incorrect relative-path concatenation by @nh2 in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/733
* Restore the stream format after writing the log prefix by @meyerj in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/731
* fix `glog-modules.cmake` install by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/739
* protect VLOG by use_logging by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/742
* Fix log filename format by @cmsflash in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/747
* Add Zhuoran Shen to AUTHORS and CONTRIBUTORS by @cmsflash in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/748
* ci: reworked windows builds by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/737
* cmake: set CMP0074 policy by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/751
* ci: use codecov token by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/752
* Added gmtoff() method in 'LogMessageTime' to get GMT offset by @vijaysattigeri in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/727
* LogCleaner: Fix relative paths and add a new test by @aesophor in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/754
* eliminate msvc warnings by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/757
* cmake: require at least version 3.16 by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/758
* ci: enable warnings as errors by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/759
* LogCleaner: make `overdue_days_` unsigned int by @aesophor in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/760
* ci: remove deprecated msvc runner by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/762
* provide backward compatible send overload by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/763
* run clang-tidy by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/765
* eliminate clang warnings by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/766
* ensure `_Unwind_Backtrace` to actually be available by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/767
* cmake: do not search for platform specific unwind by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/769
* revert to signed int atomics by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/770
* Add the "FLAG_log_year_in_prefix" by @msamoila in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/771
* use uint32 for --max-log-size by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/773
* stdcxx: eliminate excessive use of std::string::c_str() by @anpol in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/775
* cmake: require at least gflags 2.2.2 by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/781
* Changed my Email ID by @vijaysattigeri in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/782
* On Solaris, GetHostName() returns empty string by @fkolarek in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/783
* LogCleaner: avoid scanning logs too frequently by @fdgkhdkgh in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/776
* libglog.pc: Set Libs.private for static linking by @Arfrever in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/787
* cmake: enable custom prefix by default by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/788
* simplify flags export by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/791
* rename `GOOGLE_GLOG_DLL_DECL` to `GLOG_EXPORT` by @sergiud in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/764
* cmake_package_config_generate: Fix CMake warnings with CMake 3.23 by @Arfrever in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/792
* Tests: Respect TEST_TMPDIR, TMPDIR, TMP environmental variables by @Arfrever in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/794
* Add the logtostdout and colorlogtostdout flag to allow logging to stdout by @git-hulk in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/790

## New Contributors
* @xkszltl made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/651
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/666
* @luliyucoordinate made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/676
* @darbitman made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/669
* @z-aki made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/685
* @StephLin made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/674
* @Fettpet made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/696
* @Starsss made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/700
* @dfreese made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/706
* @kinsei0916 made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/710
* @ArthurBandaryk made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/718
* @nh2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/733
* @meyerj made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/731
* @cmsflash made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/747
* @vijaysattigeri made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/727
* @anpol made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/775
* @fkolarek made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/783
* @fdgkhdkgh made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/776
* @Arfrever made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/787
* @git-hulk made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/glog/pull/790

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/glog/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0-rc1

name: google-glog 0.5.0
body:
**Implemented enhancements:**

- Add support for customizing the prefix format [\#578](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/578)
- "sprintf" function being used in googletest.h which is not secure [\#536](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/536)
- stacktrace is not produced on aarch64 [\#531](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/531)
- Documenting minimum C++ version [\#527](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/527)
- Glog file separation by year [\#516](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/516)
- Bazel support for windows [\#472](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/472)
- GOOGLE\_GLOG\_DLL\_DECL needs to be put into header file [\#469](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/469)
- Glog should delete old log files automaticly [\#423](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/423)
- CHECK\_XX variants do not compile if nullptr is an argument [\#341](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/341)
- autogen.sh makes git directory dirty [\#308](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/308)
- LogSink::ToString has no microsecond precision. [\#307](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/307)
- Conan package for glog [\#262](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/262)
- How to change format of logger? for example time and verbose level name and etc [\#229](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/229)
- Username lookup needs a tuneup [\#211](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/211)
- Feature request for sudo make uninstall [\#163](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/163)
- glog should use ThreadSanitizer \(TSAN\) dynamic annotations [\#80](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/80)
- Add support for deleting old logs [\#36](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/36)
- CHECK support for nullptr \(fixes \#341\) [\#641](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/641) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- cmake: do not require a C compiler [\#627](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/627) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- use C++ headers [\#626](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/626) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- removed windows-specific headers [\#625](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/625) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- document C++ version [\#623](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/623) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- Add support for customizing the prefix format [\#554](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/554) ([santigl](https://github.com/santigl))
- Add extra information in log file header \(application build/version, actual duration time\) [\#438](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/438) ([d-uspenskiy](https://github.com/d-uspenskiy))
- Use libunwind as an imported target [\#368](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/368) ([UVV-gh](https://github.com/UVV-gh))
- Annotate LOG\_EVERY\_N macros as a benign race for TSAN [\#263](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/263) ([kennyyu](https://github.com/kennyyu))

**Fixed bugs:**

- Incorrect Unwind version parser [\#598](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/598)
- Large integers get truncated [\#594](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/594)
- Windows shared library generates linkage warnings [\#569](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/569)
- Replace obsolete \_\_CYGWIN64\_\_ macro [\#566](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/566)
- Disabling 'Symbolize functionality' is not working [\#563](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/563)
- LOG\_TO\_STRING and std namespace [\#550](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/550)
- Ownership with SetLogger [\#524](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/524)
- gtest usage not implemented in CMake build system [\#510](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/510)
- ac\_cv\_\_\_attribute\_\_\_printf\_4\_5 not set in CMake build system [\#509](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/509)
- --max\_log\_size not work when larger than 4096 [\#497](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/497)
- vmodule flag is not declared [\#466](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/466)
- TSan warning: a race in LOG\_EVERY\_N and friends [\#439](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/439)
- stacktrace unittest hangs on MSVC [\#328](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/328)
- EXC\_BAD\_ACCESS on iOS [\#275](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/275)
- Signal handler tests fail on ARM [\#256](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/256)
- glog 0.3.5 compilation failed on Centos 7 [\#243](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/243)
- ./libtool: line 6000: cd: no/lib: No such file or directory [\#215](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/215)
- Test stl\_logging fails in macOS CMake build [\#201](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/201)
- autoconf build does not version the library [\#196](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/196)
- gcc 4.7.2, 4.8.3, 4.9.2 unit test failures on C++11 [\#14](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/14)
- fix gflags windows linker warnings [\#640](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/640) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- fixed windows builds [\#639](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/639) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- fix LogCleaner::IsLogFromCurrentProject for filename\_extension [\#637](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/637) ([xiaobfly](https://github.com/xiaobfly))
- fully qualify std::string [\#624](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/624) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- handle --max\_log\_size overflow [\#622](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/622) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- cmake: optionally use gtest [\#621](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/621) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- cmake: allow to disable symbolize [\#620](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/620) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- build: set ac\_cv\_\_\_attribute\_\_\_printf\_4\_5 [\#618](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/618) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- cmake: fixed unwind patch component match check [\#613](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/613) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))

**Closed issues:**

- call InitGoogleLogging get a segment fault [\#607](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/607)
- BUILD file will create a conflict with build/ folder [\#606](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/606)
- glog don't create log file in visual c++ dll project [\#605](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/605)
- error in CMAKE installation steps--$ git clone git@github.com:google/glog.git should change to $ git clone https://github.com/google/glog.git [\#603](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/603)
- No system link created along with the log files [\#599](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/599)
- CMake build instructions do not work for paths with ampersand [\#597](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/597)
- publicly visible Bazel target no longer provides any headers [\#596](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/596)
- LogCleaner::IsLogFromCurrentProject incorrect when SetLogFilenameExtension [\#589](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/589)
- EnableLogCleaner not recognized [\#586](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/586)
- IsGlogLog problem [\#584](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/584)
- Build fails with clang-cl due to undefined symbols [\#575](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/575)
- Write the correct Windows version in the log header [\#572](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/572)
- Ability to write time in UTC in log files [\#571](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/571)
- compile error: use of overloaded operator '\<\<' is ambiguous [\#562](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/562)
- glog error log was incorrrectly written to unexpected memory [\#561](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/561)
- How to disable logging. [\#556](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/556)
- Cannot compile  "configure: WARNING: 'missing' script is too old or missing" [\#544](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/544)
- Support to modify verbose log level for mudules [\#538](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/538)
- Dropping autoconf support [\#537](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/537)
- Failed to print INFO and WARNING log [\#533](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/533)
- glog rpm installation fails if openstack-train repo is enabled [\#522](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/522)
- stripped binaries produce useless backtraces [\#514](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/514)
- Flag --incompatible\_no\_implicit\_file\_export will break Google Logging in a future Bazel release [\#512](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/512)
- Flag --incompatible\_load\_cc\_rules\_from\_bzl will break Google Logging in Bazel 1.2.1 [\#507](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/507)
- Flag --incompatible\_no\_implicit\_file\_export will break Google Logging in Bazel 1.2.1 [\#506](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/506)
- Is there any way logging without a mutex [\#504](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/504)
- Including glog/logging.h triggers -Wunused-parameter on g++ [\#493](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/493)
- Bazel: building glog with custom version gflags [\#480](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/480)
- max\_log\_size flag does not work on AIX or linux [\#476](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/476)
- cmake/DetermineGflagsNamespace.cmake was ignored when repush [\#473](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/473)
- Conflict with gflags [\#458](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/458)
- log file name error after application restart [\#457](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/457)
- App security test reports Insecure API for React Native iOS App - Binary Analysis \(IPA\) [\#453](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/453)
- multi thread cant share glog setting [\#450](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/450)
- How do I write logs to files only? [\#436](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/436)
- Crash in symbolize\_unittest on Ubuntu 18.04 x86\_64 [\#435](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/435)
- Does glog support compress log files? [\#434](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/434)
- Bazel build doesn't set correct compile flags. [\#430](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/430)
- how to change the name of final dynamic library [\#427](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/427)
- suggest about gflags [\#426](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/426)
- about filename\_extension\_ in CreateLogfile [\#395](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/395)
- Add cc\_library for ScopedMockLog [\#392](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/392)
- When building a react native project glog is causing a failure. [\#382](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/382)
- glog's endline is not thread safe when using with another logging system?! [\#379](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/379)
- Logfile full within 1s results in error [\#378](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/378)
- InitGoogleLogging bug ，Could not create logging file [\#375](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/375)
- golang/glog sometime can not create the log\_dir? [\#369](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/369)
- static google::log\_mutex destroyed on exit, while other still existing threads want to log [\#363](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/363)
- Does GLOG support log logs by day? [\#362](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/362)
- how to compile it for android ndk? [\#360](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/360)
- Cross Compile Error [\#358](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/358)
- add daemon\(1,0\)  ,then log is missing  [\#357](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/357)
- logtostderr filtering [\#356](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/356)
- Get trouble in compiling glog for android! [\#355](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/355)
- stl\_logging unit test don't pass [\#348](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/348)
- Stacktrace is not printed by failure signal handler when built with Bazel [\#346](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/346)
- When might 0.3.6 be released? [\#345](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/345)
- Unittest generates warning with C++17 regarding auto\_ptr [\#335](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/335)
- Use Upstream GoogleTest [\#333](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/333)
- Static declaration of 'pread' follows non-static declaration error while building in xcode [\#326](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/326)
- \_\_declspec\(dllimport\) public: \_\_thiscall google::base::CheckOpMessageBuilder::CheckOpMessageBuilder\(char const \*\) [\#316](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/316)
- glog can't be compiled using Android NDK r16 [\#306](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/306)
- libunwind GetStackTrace implementation doesn't allow concurrent invocations [\#298](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/298)
- VLOG before InitGoogleLogging causes crash [\#290](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/290)
- macro 'AM\_CONFIG\_HEADER' not found in library [\#271](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/271)
- Print binary-identifying info at the top of each file [\#269](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/269)
- The spec.prepare\_command lead an error [\#255](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/255)
- signalhandler\_unittest tests fails on aarch64 [\#219](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/219)
- Compiling error: undefined references to `google::base::CheckOpMessageBuilder::NewString\[abi:cxx11\]\(\) [\#195](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/195)
- \[0.3.5\] errors during make check [\#194](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/194)
- Allow coredump to be generated upon LOG\(FATAL\) [\#192](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/192)
- Thread ID on macOS [\#182](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/182)
- signalhandler\_unittest tests fails on ppc64le [\#177](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/177)
- --without-gflags is not working [\#175](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/175)
- \(gflags\_reporting.cc.o\): relocation R\_X86\_64\_32 against.rodata.str1.1' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC [\#174](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/174)
- Flag to give users choice to enable or disable time\_pid\_string attaching to the log file name  [\#173](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/173)
- DCHECK\_NOTNULL generates "expression result unused" errors with clang in strict compilation mode [\#172](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/172)
- C4722: destructor never returns potential memory leak [\#171](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/171)
- Logging to the same file from multiple processes [\#170](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/170)
- stacktrace\_libunwind-inl.h: reentrancy check should use a thread-local instead of a global variable [\#160](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/160)
- Support vmodule filter support on non GNU compilers [\#154](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/154)
- can glog write to a specified file name? [\#147](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/147)
- Expose DumpStackTraceToString to application/user [\#144](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/144)
- Adding LOG\_IF\_OR\_EVERY\_N\(\) [\#143](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/143)
- Support initializing logger and sinker by configuration  [\#135](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/135)
- Logging UnitTest failed on x64 VS2015. Reason: Pointer format not consistent [\#134](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/134)
- source/logging\_unittest.cc:64 error : 'GFLAGS\_NAMESPACE' is not not a namespance-name [\#131](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/131)
- Allow glog to be queried as to whether or not InitGoogleLogging has been called. [\#125](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/125)

name: google-glog 0.5.0-rc2
body:
**Implemented enhancements:**

- Add support for customizing the prefix format [\#578](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/578)
- stacktrace is not produced on aarch64 [\#531](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/531)
- Documenting minimum C++ version [\#527](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/527)
- GOOGLE\_GLOG\_DLL\_DECL needs to be put into header file [\#469](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/469)
- CHECK\_XX variants do not compile if nullptr is an argument [\#341](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/341)
- autogen.sh makes git directory dirty [\#308](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/308)
- Conan package for glog [\#262](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/262)
- How to change format of logger? for example time and verbose level name and etc [\#229](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/229)
- Username lookup needs a tuneup [\#211](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/211)
- Feature request for sudo make uninstall [\#163](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/163)
- glog should use ThreadSanitizer \(TSAN\) dynamic annotations [\#80](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/80)
- Add support for deleting old logs [\#36](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/36)
- CHECK support for nullptr \(fixes \#341\) [\#641](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/641) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- cmake: do not require a C compiler [\#627](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/627) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- use C++ headers [\#626](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/626) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- removed windows-specific headers [\#625](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/625) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- document C++ version [\#623](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/623) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- Add support for customizing the prefix format [\#554](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/554) ([santigl](https://github.com/santigl))

**Fixed bugs:**

- Large integers get truncated [\#594](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/594)
- Windows shared library generates linkage warnings [\#569](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/569)
- Disabling 'Symbolize functionality' is not working [\#563](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/563)
- LOG\_TO\_STRING and std namespace [\#550](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/550)
- gtest usage not implemented in CMake build system [\#510](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/510)
- ac\_cv\_\_\_attribute\_\_\_printf\_4\_5 not set in CMake build system [\#509](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/509)
- --max\_log\_size not work when larger than 4096 [\#497](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/497)
- vmodule flag is not declared [\#466](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/466)
- TSan warning: a race in LOG\_EVERY\_N and friends [\#439](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/439)
- stacktrace unittest hangs on MSVC [\#328](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/328)
- EXC\_BAD\_ACCESS on iOS [\#275](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/275)
- Signal handler tests fail on ARM [\#256](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/256)
- glog 0.3.5 compilation failed on Centos 7 [\#243](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/243)
- ./libtool: line 6000: cd: no/lib: No such file or directory [\#215](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/215)
- autoconf build does not version the library [\#196](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/196)
- gcc 4.7.2, 4.8.3, 4.9.2 unit test failures on C++11 [\#14](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/14)
- fix gflags windows linker warnings [\#640](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/640) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- fixed windows builds [\#639](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/639) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- fix LogCleaner::IsLogFromCurrentProject for filename\_extension [\#637](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/637) ([xiaobfly](https://github.com/xiaobfly))
- fully qualify std::string [\#624](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/624) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- handle --max\_log\_size overflow [\#622](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/622) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- cmake: optionally use gtest [\#621](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/621) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- cmake: allow to disable symbolize [\#620](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/620) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- build: set ac\_cv\_\_\_attribute\_\_\_printf\_4\_5 [\#618](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/618) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))

**Closed issues:**

- call InitGoogleLogging get a segment fault [\#607](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/607)
- Build fails with clang-cl due to undefined symbols [\#575](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/575)
- compile error: use of overloaded operator '\<\<' is ambiguous [\#562](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/562)
- Support to modify verbose log level for mudules [\#538](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/538)
- max\_log\_size flag does not work on AIX or linux [\#476](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/476)
- App security test reports Insecure API for React Native iOS App - Binary Analysis \(IPA\) [\#453](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/453)
- How do I write logs to files only? [\#436](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/436)
- Does glog support compress log files? [\#434](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/434)
- Bazel build doesn't set correct compile flags. [\#430](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/430)
- how to change the name of final dynamic library [\#427](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/427)
- suggest about gflags [\#426](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/426)
- about filename\_extension\_ in CreateLogfile [\#395](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/395)
- Add cc\_library for ScopedMockLog [\#392](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/392)
- When building a react native project glog is causing a failure. [\#382](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/382)
- glog's endline is not thread safe when using with another logging system?! [\#379](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/379)
- Logfile full within 1s results in error [\#378](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/378)
- InitGoogleLogging bug ，Could not create logging file [\#375](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/375)
- static google::log\_mutex destroyed on exit, while other still existing threads want to log [\#363](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/363)
- Does GLOG support log logs by day? [\#362](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/362)
- how to compile it for android ndk? [\#360](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/360)
- Cross Compile Error [\#358](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/358)
- add daemon\(1,0\)  ,then log is missing  [\#357](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/357)
- logtostderr filtering [\#356](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/356)
- Get trouble in compiling glog for android! [\#355](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/355)
- stl\_logging unit test don't pass [\#348](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/348)
- Unittest generates warning with C++17 regarding auto\_ptr [\#335](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/335)
- Use Upstream GoogleTest [\#333](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/333)
- Static declaration of 'pread' follows non-static declaration error while building in xcode [\#326](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/326)
- \_\_declspec\(dllimport\) public: \_\_thiscall google::base::CheckOpMessageBuilder::CheckOpMessageBuilder\(char const \*\) [\#316](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/316)
- glog can't be compiled using Android NDK r16 [\#306](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/306)
- VLOG before InitGoogleLogging causes crash [\#290](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/290)
- macro 'AM\_CONFIG\_HEADER' not found in library [\#271](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/271)
- Print binary-identifying info at the top of each file [\#269](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/269)
- The spec.prepare\_command lead an error [\#255](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/255)
- signalhandler\_unittest tests fails on aarch64 [\#219](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/219)
- Compiling error: undefined references to `google::base::CheckOpMessageBuilder::NewString\[abi:cxx11\]\(\) [\#195](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/195)
- \[0.3.5\] errors during make check [\#194](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/194)
- Allow coredump to be generated upon LOG\(FATAL\) [\#192](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/192)
- Thread ID on macOS [\#182](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/182)
- signalhandler\_unittest tests fails on ppc64le [\#177](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/177)
- --without-gflags is not working [\#175](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/175)
- \(gflags\_reporting.cc.o\): relocation R\_X86\_64\_32 against.rodata.str1.1' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC [\#174](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/174)
- Flag to give users choice to enable or disable time\_pid\_string attaching to the log file name  [\#173](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/173)
- DCHECK\_NOTNULL generates "expression result unused" errors with clang in strict compilation mode [\#172](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/172)
- C4722: destructor never returns potential memory leak [\#171](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/171)
- Logging to the same file from multiple processes [\#170](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/170)
- Support vmodule filter support on non GNU compilers [\#154](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/154)
- can glog write to a specified file name? [\#147](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/147)
- Expose DumpStackTraceToString to application/user [\#144](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/144)
- Adding LOG\_IF\_OR\_EVERY\_N\(\) [\#143](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/143)
- Support initializing logger and sinker by configuration  [\#135](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/135)
- Logging UnitTest failed on x64 VS2015. Reason: Pointer format not consistent [\#134](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/134)
- source/logging\_unittest.cc:64 error : 'GFLAGS\_NAMESPACE' is not not a namespance-name [\#131](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/131)
- Allow glog to be queried as to whether or not InitGoogleLogging has been called. [\#125](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/125)
- Allow a log file to be simply named "foobar.log" with no appended string [\#124](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/124)
- Can I use default FailureSignalHandler\(\) and my custom failure funcion together? [\#121](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/121)
- logging\_fail fail for x64 in VS2013, libglog\_static [\#119](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/119)
- travis env build failure : /bin/bash: aclocal-1.14: command not found [\#117](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/117)
- Allow more than just argv\[0\] in InitGoogleLogging [\#113](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/113)
- Can glog be shutdown totally? [\#111](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/111)
- A memory bug detected by valgrind? [\#109](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/109)
- src/demangle.h:80:27: error: expected initializer before 'Demangle' bool GOOGLE\_GLOG\_DLL\_DECL Demangle\(const char \*mangled, char \*out, int out\_size\); [\#108](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/108)
- glog fails to build on ARM64/AArch64 [\#107](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/107)
- logging\_unittest-logging\_unittest.o ERROR 1 [\#104](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/104)
- FATAL error with pthread\_cancel in multi-thread program [\#102](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/102)
- configure: Hardcoded `am__api_version='1.14'` breaks build on systems with autoconf 1.15 [\#97](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/97)
- ppc64le support for glog [\#89](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/89)
- please remove generated autotools from the git repo [\#86](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/86)
- module based minloglevel [\#66](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/66)
- glog  print wchar\_t? [\#64](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/64)
- Android build is broken [\#59](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/59)
- libglog.pc.in should include libunwind as private dep for static linking case [\#57](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/57)
- demangle\_unittest.sh fails with GCC 5 \(configured --with-default-libstdcxx-abi=new, which is the default\) [\#40](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/40)
- Make the documentation browsable online [\#39](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/39)
- Make error: failed to link with libgflags.a [\#38](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/38)
- Mark LOG\(FATAL\) with \[\[noreturn\]\] [\#28](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/28)
- Logfile with more restrictive permissions control [\#23](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/23)
- Asynchronous/double-buffering support? [\#16](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/16)
- clang34, 35, 36 fails to pass unit tests with C++03 [\#13](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/13)

**Merged pull requests:**

- Add Windows builds using GitHub Actions [\#638](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/638) ([NeroBurner](https://github.com/NeroBurner))
- Use generated config.h for Windows. [\#635](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/635) ([drigz](https://github.com/drigz))
- cmake: build shared libs by default [\#632](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/632) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- fixed file extension [\#631](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/631) ([xiaobfly](https://github.com/xiaobfly))
- bazel: use expand\_template instead of genrules [\#628](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/628) ([drigz](https://github.com/drigz))
- cmake: export symbols selectively [\#619](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/619) ([sergiud](https://github.com/sergiud))
- Change counter type to uint64 [\#595](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/595) ([r-barnes](https://github.com/r-barnes))

name: google-glog 0.5.0-rc1
body:
**Implemented enhancements:**

- Use libunwind as an imported target [\#368](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/368) ([UVV-gh](https://github.com/UVV-gh))
- Annotate LOG\_EVERY\_N macros as a benign race for TSAN [\#263](https://github.com/google/glog/pull/263) ([kennyyu](https://github.com/kennyyu))

**Fixed bugs:**

- Incorrect Unwind version parser [\#598](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/598)

**Closed issues:**

- publicly visible Bazel target no longer provides any headers [\#596](https://github.com/google/glog/issues/596)

name: google-glog 0.4.0
body:
* build: cleanup temps and remove NEWS by @jackwish (#410)
* Fix unused variable warning in GCC by @pwnall (#412)
* automake: relax GNU standard directory style by @jackwish (#408)
* update README.md filename in Makefile.am by @NeroBurner (#403)
* ci: add clang-cxx17 toolchain by @NeroBurner (#406)
* remove register keyword from unittest by @NeroBurner (#405)
* Use push/pop macro when supressing warning by @kwaegel (#397)
* ci: add appveyor and travis config by @NeroBurner (#330)
* Make symbolize.cc thread safe even on shared fds by @tzik (#388)
* Don't crash on some forms of invalid ELF files by @bsilver8192 (#367)
* Fix mistype in comment by @zaporozhets (#371)
* Fix errors with BUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON for Visual Studio 2017 (fixes #343) by @dzung (#344)
* fix glog.html link to gflags repository by @NeroBurner (#336)
* Delete NEWS by @NeroBurner (#337)
* Fix windows logging unittest by @NeroBurner (#331)
* tests: fix compilation with C++17 by @NeroBurner (#332)
* Fix mingw cross compile by @NeroBurner (#324)
* Resolve missing prototype warning by @Nazg (#302)
* Fix redefined warnings from config.h by @Nazg (#303)
* Make int conversion explicit and fix clang warning by @samuela (#305)
* konsole family of terminfo supports colored output by @Nazg (#304)
* CMake Update by @Mizux (#292)
* Use target gflags instead of old VARIABLES by @Mizux (#283)
* Add an example using glog from Bazel by @drigz (#276)
* Update gflags to latest master by @drigz (#277)
* Fixed undeclared identifier error by @sergiud (#281)
* Build with Bazel. by @qzmfranklin (#232)
* Compute base addresses from program headers while reading /proc/self/maps. by @pcc (#261)
* Cache strlen outside of cycles (PVS-Studio) by @dimhotepus (#106)
* Shell escape arguments to /bin/mail. by @ukai (#260)
* Fix username lookup in case of missing USER environment variable by @DariuszOstolski (#245)
* #253: Use MS preprocessor idiom to disable warning by @DariuszOstolski (#254)
* Zero allocation fix by @sergiud (#226)
* Fix for missing exports (fixes #227) by @sergiud (#228)
* Fix LOG_EVERY_N with clang -Wunused-local-typedef by @jray272 (#225)
* Run src/windows/preprocess.sh to pick up latest logging.h.in changes by @jray272 (#224)
* Update Windows docs by @andschwa (#218)
* cmake: fixed gflags namespace detection (fixes #193) by @sergiud (#209)
* cmake: do not hardcode relative install directories by @sergiud (#153)
* cmake: changed project name from google-glog to glog by @sergiud (#152)
* Cygwin support by @sergiud (#157)
* [RFC] reduce heap memory allocations to zero by @sergiud (#158)
* rate limit calls to posix_fadvise() by @pixelb (#145)
* Use gflags ALIAS instead of ${gflags_XXX} vars by @v1bri (#199)
* Port stack tracing to Windows by @andschwa (#168)

name: google-glog 0.3.5
body:
* CHECK_NOTNULL works with smart pointers when compiled in C++11
* Add __declspec(noreturn) on Win
* DCHECK_ALWAYS_ON to make D* enabled under NDEBUG
* MinGW: avoid the error "conflicting declaration 'typedef DWORD pthread_t'" etc.
* NULL sinks_ after deletion to prevent dangling pointer
* Symbolize: Calculate a module's zero VA using program headers
* Allow permission line in /proc/self/map to be "rwx"
* Add support for PowerPC
* Use namespace GFLAGS_NAMESPACE instead namespace gflags. #62
* Win: use _fdopen instead of fdopen. Fix #73
* Win: FAILED macro can't be used with HANDLE. Fix #79
* Avoid calling new/malloc in signalhandler to fix #78
* Reset SIGABRT action only if FailureSignalHandler is installed
* Fix missing public include directory
* Fix double-free in unit test on Windows
* Add logfile_mode to control logfile permissions to fix #23
* Fix mocklog unused arguments
* Fix redefinition of _XOPEN_SOURCE
* Don't call RAW_VLOG with locking vmodule_lock to fix #29
* Add CMake support. closes #4
* Fix #8 AddLogSink memory leak
* Add #ifndefs to avoid collision with other google opensource projects
* LOG_STRING: use std::vector and std::string
* Adds color output support for tmux terminals
* Fix x64/Debug build on MSVS

name: glog: 0.3.4
body:
# google-glog 0.3.4
- repository moved from code.google.com/p/google-glog to github.com/google/glog
- fixes for latest MSVS
- add libc++ support
- fix build issue in demangle.cc
- add callback for OpenObjectFileContainingPcAndGetStartAddress
- add StrError and replace posix_strerror_r call
- fix VC build by adding GOOGLE_GLOG_DLL_DECL
- style fix for C++11
- reduce dynamic allocation from 3 to 1 per log message
- attempt to improve mingw-w64 support
- support unordered_(map|set) by stl_logging
